name: css-writing-mode
description: Css module of single purpose classes for writing mode

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-writing-mode.css > css/css-writing-mode.css && tachyons src/css-writing-mode.css --minify > css/css-writing-mode.min.css && tachyons src/css-writing-mode.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
